title: Living tomorrow. No. 096
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Biological control of garden pests (using other insects); control of magnetism using a combination of electro and permanent (ie conventional) magnets; machine peeling of onions - a particularly delicate process; electronic monitoring and computer diagnosis of vital signs during surgery.
